alert.note: Alert for Tooele (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 7:26PM MDT until July 26 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM MDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN TOOELE COUNTY... At 726 PM MDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Dugway Proving Ground Test Range to near Vernon, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Automated weather stations continue to report winds up to 65 mph. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Dugway English Village, Vernon, Tooele Army Depot South, Skull Valley, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Rush Valley, Faust and Lofgreen. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
